zwave.zwaveAllianceProductDocumentation: https://Products.Z-WaveAlliance.org/ProductManual/File?folder=&filename=Manuals/1178/Instructions - Aeon Labs Key Fob Gen5 MCert.pdf

instruction.en: Short press the "Include" button on the {{driverNameEn}}
instruction.nl: Druk kort op de "Include" knop op de {{driverNameNl}}

instruction.en: Short press the "Exclude" button on the {{driverNameEn}}
instruction.nl: Druk kort op de "Exclude" knop op de {{driverNameNl}}

hint.en:
Group 1 is assigned to the Lifeline association group and every device has 5 nodes to associate.
When the Key Fob is in Scene Mode, pressing the control button, which will send the corresponding Scene id to the associated nodes.
